item.title: Bargaining over Marriage Payments: Theory, Evidence, and Policy Implications (Job Market Paper)
item.description: Highlight: This article delves into a conservative marriage tradition in Chinese society that involves bidirectional wealth transfers: bride price and dowry, and the broad implication of a pro-women marriage law amendment in a society with high gender inequality.
